mapper.sql: bii.inspection_item_id, bii.parent_id, bii.inspection_item_code, bii.inspection_item_standard, bii.inspection_item_type, bii.inspection_item_desc, bii.`status`, bii.remark, bii.organization_id, bii.create_user_id, bii.create_time, bii.modified_user_id, bii.modified_time, bii.is_delete
mapper.select:
select , u.user_name as create_user_name, s.user_name as modified_user_name, bo.organization_name from base_inspection_item bii left join sys_user u on bii.create_user_id=u.user_id left join sys_user s on bii.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join base_organization bo on bii.organization_id = bo.organization_id
bii.inspection_item_type = 1
and bii.inspection_item_code like CONCAT('%', #{inspectionItemCode}, '%')
and bii.inspection_item_desc like CONCAT('%', #{inspectionItemDesc}, '%')
and bii.status=#{status}
and date_format(bii.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and bii.organization_id=#{orgId}
and #FULL_FROM_QUERY
order by bii.create_time desc
